description:
A young boy, yearning to take to the skies and reach the Island of the Astrals, suddenly found both his life and his fate linked to a mysterious, blue-haired girl.

They set off on a skyward journey, meeting trusted friends, crewmates, and the massive airship to be their wings along the way. While evading the clutches of the empire and facing off against fearsome primal beasts, the duo felt their bond deepening—their lives changing.

But despite these tribulations, they're still a long way away from their elusive destination.

The boy and girl, accompanied by fellow seekers of adventure, depart once more into the vast blue skies.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: グランブルーファンタジー The Animation (新作)

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Gods
tags.description: Prominently features a character of divine or religious nature.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Aviation
tags.description: Regarding the flying or operation of aircraft.

tags.name: Yandere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is obsessively in love with another, to the point of acting deranged or violent.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Zombie
tags.description: Prominently features reanimated corpses which often prey on live humans and turn them into zombies.

Japanese-Korean animator originating from Miyuki Production. Currently freelance.

name.native: セブン・ビリオン・ドッツ

node.description: Website | Twitter | Instagram | YouTube Biography Seven Billion Dots is a three-piece rock band that formed the 24th of February, 2018. The core members of the band consist of Masafumi Okamoto, a vocalist from the United States with roots in Western house music. The other two members of the band are guitarist Ken Matsuzaki, and drummer Lyo Matsuzaki who, in fact, are real twins. On the 10th of July 2019, the band released their first mini album titled "Pieces", while also announcing a major debut the 11th of December, 2019. The band's major debut will be an E.P, that will release on the already aforementioned date, the 11th of December, which will feature their opening theme song from the anime GRANBLUE FANTASY the Animation Season 2 as the main song. On the 4th of October 2019, the band appeared with the opening theme song for the second anime season of GRANBLUE FANTASY the Animation, respectively named GRANBLUE FANTASY the Animation Season 2, where they presented the song "Stay With Me". On the same day the first episode of the anime aired, they also uploaded the TV-size opening version of the theme song to their official YouTube channel. You can find the music video here: 「Stay With Me -TV-size-」. Record Label: Epic Records Japan (Source(s): rojack.jp, ja.wikipedia.org)

**Birthplace:** Towada, Aomori Prefecture, Japan

__Biography:__
Junji Ishiwatari is a guitarist, lyricist and music producer. He was the guitarist of the rock band SUPERCAR, until they broke up in 2005. 

Ishiwatari has worked wtih [Chatmonchy](https://anilist.co/staff/105025), [9mm Parabellum Bullet](https://anilist.co/staff/126805), [Negoto](https://anilist.co/staff/148616), [NICO Touches the Walls](https://anilist.co/staff/103965), etc.

name.native: トウキョウ・レコーディングス

node.description:
[Website](https://skirtskirtskirt.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/s_k_i_r_t) | [Soundcloud](https://soundcloud.com/skirtskirt)

Skirt, alternatively known by his real name Wataru Sawabe, is a Japanese musician.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/岡真里子)

Originating from Studio Live. Notable works as a character designer include [Jigoku Shoujo](https://anilist.co/anime/228/), [Ghost Hound](https://anilist.co/anime/2596/) and [Nurarihyon no Mago](https://anilist.co/anime/7592/). Close friends with [Hiroshi Watanabe](https://anilist.co/staff/101189/), and often designs the characters for the shows which he directs.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Chom2Start)  |  [SOUL OF JOE (fansite)](http://soulofjoe.jp/index.html)

Currently working for Studio M2.

He's an Ashita no Joe ''collector'' and fan and has contributed to books, TV programs, museums and more. He is also an administrator of the fansite ''SOUL OF JOE''.
